content: --वेदि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} pertaining to the inside of the sacrificial ground. {%--<ab>adv.</ab>%} within this ground. (--दिः --दी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [अंतर्गता वेदिर्यत्र देशे] the tract of land between the rivers Gaṅgā and Yamunā, regarded as a sacred region and the principal seat of Āryan Brāhmaṇas; <ab>cf.</ab> एते भगवत्यौ भूमिदेवानां मूलमायतनमंतर्वेदिपूर्वेण कलिंदकन्यामंदाकिन्यौ संगच्छेते <ls>A. R. 7</ls>; it is supposed to have extended from Prayāga to Haridvāra and is also known by the names of शशस्थली and ब्रह्मावर्त. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab> inhabitants of this land.
